attributes.action: Keep Nottingham a Workplace Parking Levy free city
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Nottingham City Council are due to Implement a WPL starting from 2010, costing each business or employee £180 per parking space. This cost will rise to over £300 per space over the next few years. This is to pay for another tram system, the original of which is not paying for itself at the moment anyway. 

SAY NO to another tax on the working people of Nottingham.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Keep Nottingham a Workplace Parking Levy free city."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page16030.asp

Prime Minister's Office
